video.title: L.A.’s Finest
video.synopsis: Two cops take on the city's most dangerous criminals while trying to leave their complicated pasts behind in this spinoff of the "Bad Boys" franchise.

episodes.synopsis: When a driver crashes through L.A. traffic to save his nanny, Syd and McKenna uncover a connection to a drug cartel that lands them in a precarious spot.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: After a huge amount of drugs goes missing, a familiar face from McKenna's past appears as Syd searches for Knox. A video of a woman's murder goes viral.
episodes.title: Defiance

episodes.synopsis: A body falling from the sky spurs Syd and McKenna's latest investigation as the Bens look into a team of bank robbers. Patrick becomes district attorney.
episodes.title: Con Air

episodes.synopsis: McKenna and Syd must pull off a seemingly impossible mission without a trace. Izzy behaves strangely while Syd starts to see ghosts from her past.
episodes.title: Déjà Vu

episodes.synopsis: The hunt for Knox intensifies as McKenna and Syd work to solve the mystery behind the death of a trans woman. Syd's former flame transfers to the LAPD.
episodes.title: Farewell…

episodes.synopsis: The team continues its efforts to bring a killer to justice. Dante's return makes it hard for McKenna to hide her past as Syd lands in a mess of her own.
episodes.title: …My Lovely

episodes.synopsis: The Bens join Syd and McKenna's pursuit of Knox. Meanwhile, a complicated family crisis leaves Syd conflicted while McKenna faces a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Book of Secrets

episodes.synopsis: McKenna must confront Patrick about her past then tries to convince him to bend the law. A murder investigation leads the Bens to a hefty heist.
episodes.title: Dead Men Tell No Tales

episodes.synopsis: As the task force probes the case of the missing diamonds and executes a major drug bust, McKenna and Syd's deepest secrets rise to the surface.
episodes.title: Dangerous Minds

episodes.synopsis: McKenna must make a choice between her brother and her future. Syd embeds herself further in Bishop's operations. The heist investigation continues.
episodes.title: Enemy of the State

episodes.synopsis: The partners deal with trust issues after a shocking discovery. Then, a murder at a scenic Los Angeles park gets added to their caseload.
episodes.title: Thief

episodes.synopsis: Syd and Nancy close in on Knox while Warren tries to break ties with Carlene. Izzy comes face-to-face with her mother's killer.
episodes.title: Armageddon

episodes.synopsis: The team searches for their target, whose extortion plan involves the kids. A fire pushes everyone to act fast. Later, Syd receives an urgent call.
episodes.title: Bad Girls

episodes.synopsis: Syd grieves the loss of her friend as McKenna feels guilty over everything that's happened. The death of a Koreatown legend has the community riled up.
episodes.title: The Curse of the Black Pearl

episodes.synopsis: As the team tracks down the culprit behind a wave of crimes in Koreatown, Syd discovers a surprising video and McKenna is triggered by memories of Iraq.
episodes.title: The Lone Ranger

episodes.synopsis: After meeting with one of Jen's former clients, Syd and McKenna believe they're on the right path but find their lives suddenly in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Thief of Hearts

episodes.synopsis: With the Koreatown case behind them, the team turns their attention to a new investigation involving a swimmer found dead in an apparent hit-and-run.
episodes.title: Beverly Hills Cops

episodes.synopsis: New details arise that suggest the Koreatown case is far from over. A new app is linked to a string of crimes. Syd learns a shocking truth about Jen.
episodes.title: Gone in 60 Seconds

episodes.synopsis: While dealing with a chaotic case involving Nico, McKenna starts family therapy. Meanwhile, Syd delivers unfortunate news to Jen's family.
episodes.title: Maverick

episodes.synopsis: Syd has an emotional conversation with someone close to Jen. McKenna and Patrick make a painful decision. Walker winds up in a life-or-death situation.
episodes.title: March or Die

episodes.synopsis: The LAPD team races against the clock to save one of their own. Syd and McKenna get caught in a shootout.
episodes.title: Bad Company

episodes.synopsis: McKenna is spotted at dinner with a man. The Koreatown crime surge affects the neighborhood's residents. A deadly robbery goes down at a dispensary.
episodes.title: Kangaroo Jack

episodes.synopsis: When Emma goes missing, Syd jumps into action as McKenna goes undercover at a veterans retreat. Patrick finds scandalous photos on his phone.
episodes.title: Deliver Us From Evil

episodes.synopsis: An internal affairs investigation raises flags for Syd and Baines. The team is also led to a onesie-wearing arms dealer. Patrick goes on the attack.
episodes.title: Rafferty and the Gold Dust Twins

episodes.synopsis: As Patrick awaits the election results, the team works to find a killer at large. Syd considers coming clean about the events in the scrap yard.
episodes.title: Coyote Ugly

episodes.synopsis: An untimely death leaves McKenna grieving and tying up loose ends. The whole squad attempts to pull off a sneaky plan and restore peace in Koreatown.
episodes.title: For Life
